data.text: @DSSilver2 @VSB39 Sad to see what's happening and how the VSB and Province are turning a blind eye to students/families in need and the videos and articles the students themselves are publishing.  Seeing these moves to make MACC changes and closing QEA is just like watching Russia invading Ukraine
@CarrieBercic @ehnewspaper @VSB39 @CarrieBercic We were removed from the Jan. 27 workshop (twice!) Other participants were dropped from other sessions.

@kyenta_m @DSSilver2 @VSB39 We asked that question while producing the below story. No answer.

https://t.co/PK7H5mZ75h

@DSSilver2 @VSB39 Wow. This is so concerning - again, @VSB39 seems to not be interested in engaging in dialogue. 
@VSB39, care to share why @DSSilver2 was removed? #AccountabilityinEducation
